page.title: 03Norton & Lenchwick People
page.content:
On the 8.5.85 2 adults did these activities: A.Got up at 07.30,had toast and coffee for breakfast which she cooked herself For lunch she had sausage chips and for tea she had cod in cheese sauce with biscuits inbetween.She watched Dallas,Crossroads and the news also she listened to Radio's 1 and 2.She read the Sun,Woman and Womans Own. During the day she went to work and to a Youth Club.She bought nothing.
B.Got up at 07.00,had bread and butter for breakfast.For lunch he had soup and pork pie and for tea he had sausage and mash.He watched breakfast T.V.,The Westminster Abbey service, Victory remembered and the news.He read the Daily Express,went to Evesham bought groceries and went to a V.E. Day celebration dance at Norton Club.
